description: The current value (controlled).
The default value (uncontrolled).
The minimum allowed date that a user may select.
The maximum allowed date that a user may select.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: The color of the time input.
The number of months to display at once. Up to 3 months are supported. Passing a number greater than 1 will disable the showMonthAndYearPickers prop.
Controls the currently focused date within the calendar.
The date that is focused when the calendar first mounts (uncountrolled).
The width to be applied to the calendar component. This value is multiplied by the visibleMonths number to determine the total width of the calendar.
Controls the behavior of paging. Pagination either works by advancing the visible page by visibleDuration (default) or one unit of visibleDuration.
The style of weekday names to display in the calendar grid header.
Whether to show month and year pickers.
When combined with isDateUnavailable, determines whether non-contiguous ranges, i.e. ranges containing unavailable dates, may be selected.
Whether the calendar is disabled.
Whether the calendar value is immutable.
Whether the current selection is invalid according to application logic.
Whether to automatically focus the calendar when it mounts.
Whether to show the description or error message.
Whether to show the shadow in the selected dates.
Custom content to be included in the top of the calendar.
Custom content to be included in the bottom of the calendar.
Callback that is called for each date of the calendar. If it returns true, then the date is unavailable.
This function helps to reduce the bundle size by providing a custom calendar system.
An error message for the field.

type: (value: { inputValue: string, selectedKey: React.Key }) => ValidationError | true | null | undefined
description: Validate input values when committing (e.g. on blur), returning error messages for invalid values.
Whether to hide the disabled or invalid dates.
Whether to disable the animation of the calendar.
